ValidationRule.description: This will prevent an Originations user from updating the Stage of a Deal to Underwriting or Submitted into Underwriting.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), OR( $Profile.Name = "Origination Manager", $Profile.Name = "Sales Analyst Bridge Operations Hybrid", $Profile.Name = "Sales Analyst Term Operations Hybrid", $Profile.Name = "Relationship Manager", $Profile.Name = "Sales Analyst"), OR( TEXT(StageName) = "Underwriting", TEXT(StageName) = "Submitted to Underwriting"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Type , 'Term Loan'), ISPICKVAL(Type , 'Bridge Loan')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You have chosen an invalid Stage. If you are trying to submit your Deal for approval into Underwriting, please use the "Submit to UW" button.
